amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of the National Commission on Terrorist Attacks Upon the United States. \ As amended by the Smith (NJ) amendment (A002), language was added that ensures that at least two members of the commission are family members of those who died in the attacks of September 11, 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish the National Commission on Terrorist Attacks Upon the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 188 (Roll no. 347).
